greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A134309 * A097806.
comment: Triangle read by rows given by [1,-1,0,0,0,0,0,0,...] DELTA [1,1,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,...] where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938. - _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 20 2007
formula: A134309 * A134315 as infinite lower triangular matrices. Triangle read by rows, for n>1, (n-1) zeros followed by 2^(n-1), 2^(n-1). As an infinite lower triangular matrix, (1, 1, 2, 4, 8, ...) in the main diagonal and (1, 2, 4, 8, ...) in the subdiagonal.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Oct 19 2007
